title: Mac gets stuck on LoLLauncher
body:
Hello, I am on a Mac OSX, and usually when I open League it takes a while for the LoLLauncher to kick in.
But recently, my graphics card broke, and now my League gets stuck on LoLLauncher.

Now I not only have to deal with a (supposedly) broken graphics card, but I also can't even open league. Help

replies.body: The symptoms that you're describing sound like a network issue failing to connect to our servers.  For that, going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide is your best bet.  Your graphics card breaking is a pretty serious issue...you wouldn't be able to run League of Legends...or even see your monitor.  This is something you'd want to have a repair shop look into!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EfoX6uuA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-24T21:00:46.505+0000)
>
> The symptoms that you're describing sound like a network issue failing to connect to our servers.  For that, going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide is your best bet.  Your graphics card breaking is a pretty serious issue...you wouldn't be able to run League of Legends...or even see your monitor.  This is something you'd want to have a repair shop look into!

Thank you and yes, I am getting my graphics card fixed as we speak.
